name: Tiles (itch)
description:
Tiles is a very simple, and incomplete puzzle platforming game. It was the first game I built well over a year ago now, but it is very fun to play in my opinion, though it might be confusing!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Basically, once you get into the game, you click on one of the balls on screen to access a Level.

When you're in the level, controls are as follows:

'M' - Takes you to the Menu

'W A S D' - For movement

'Space Bar' - To Jump

'E' - To Press Buttons

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
